title: [高悬赏]bc不定时断开连接
author: 地狱在人间
txt_content:

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
disable_entity_metadata_rewrite in waterfall.yml
打开waterfall.yml配置文件
看看相关配置

replies.author: 地狱在人间
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-9-8 19:17
disable_entity_metadata_rewrite in waterfall.yml
打开waterfall.yml配置文件
看看相关配置 ...
我能不把框框设置为true情况下修好吗，不然tab列表会乱
